import React, { Component } from 'react'; class SignUp extends Component { constructor() { super() this.state = { signUpName: "", signUpEmail: "", signUpPassword: "" } } onNameChange = (event) => { this.setState({ signUpName: event.target.value }) } onEmailChange = (event) => { this.setState({ signUpEmail: event.target.value }) console.log(this.state.signUpEmail) } OnSubmitSignUp = () => { this.props.onClickSign("signin") } onSubmitSignIn = () => { this.props.onClickSign("signout") } render(){ return(

Sign In

Sign Up
) } } export default SignUp;
